titleStmt.title: Materials for union, proposed to publick consideration, with indifferency to all parties by M.A. Pem. Col. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by the booksellers in Oxford,
